tag_list: angel, vc, investors, angelinvestors, venturecapital, earlystage, startup
overview:
Rob Connors is the Founder & CEO of 4thetable - a technology platform and application targeting the Hospitality Industry. Originally from the Napa Valley, he has worked in the Silicon Valley where he went public with VeriSign (now Symantec).

With 20 years of International experience, he is a master in Sales and Business Development. He is known for envisioning and providing solutions to challenging problems and has built successful and profitable teams in the US, Brazil, UK, Germany, Korea, Australia, etc.

4thetable has reached several milestones over the past 2 years, which include a world class team and strategic alliances to quickly bring product to market.

Having turned down over 1 million in funding, Rob Connors currently seeks the right VC or Angel to back an incredible venture.

Contact - rob@4thetable.com
